data: I had just been looking long and sadly at Holbein’s plowman, and was walking through the fields, musing on rustic life and the destiny of the husbandman.
Sand, George, 1804-1876; Abot, Eugène-Michel-Joseph, 1836-1894 [Illustrator]; Sedgwick, Ellery, 1872-1960 [Translator]; Sedgwick, Jane Minot [Translator]
